channel.title: Website Projects
channel.description: During the program, I completed two websites as final term projects in two classes. Click on the links below for more information and highlights from each site project.

item.title: Les Clark Research Project
item.description:
This research project about Disney animator Les Clark, completed as part of an independent study on the history of Disney Animation, culminated in a website that contained a biographical profile, an article, photos, clip reels and a bibliographic page with both print and electronic resources.

Please click on the images below to enter two sample pages on the site. To return to the main portfolio site, click the back button on your browser.

item.title: Disney Restoration Project
item.description:
The term project for the Archaeology of the Medium class (MIAS 220) was to trace the development of a particular filming technology and then relate it to an aspect of current archival practice. For my project, I completed a website about Disney Animation filming technologies, and how they relate to their current restoration practices.

Please click on the images below to enter two sample pages on the site. To return to the main portfolio site, click the back button on your browser.
